data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Barranquitas, Puerto Rico the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Barranquitas, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Barranquitas, Puerto Rico to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 17,246 people in the state of Barranquitas who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 27,800 souls in Barranquitas and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Barranquitas
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Barranquitas, Barranquitas, Puerto Rico.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 27,800 people living in Barranquitas, Puerto Rico. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Barranquitas, Puerto Rico and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Barranquitas prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
